LCBB (Lightweight Cookie Baking Box): Made with Mr Sim Cher Boon (https://www.linkedin.com/in/cherboon-sim/) for HackSmith V5
This project is a Mozilla Firefox browser extension designed to streamline user interactions with a server by automating cookie management and routing traffic through the server as a proxy.
Users can log in directly through the extension, select cookies, and enjoy simplified workflows with reduced manual effort.
Telegram Bot template: Utilised the Telegram Api module to create a bot that is able to send and receive messages
Template includes a menu, reply on message received and permantly active feature
Guess the player Web Game: Built a web application that asks the user to guess the player using data scraped from the internet using modules like Beautiful soup 4 and Pandas.
Stored data in a Relational Database Management System (RDBMS) database using SQL.
Deployed application using Digital Ocean, a Cloud Server.
Cybersecurity Blog: Coded up a personal blog post to keep track of all the Capture The Flag (CTF) Competition that I am apart of.
League of Learning: Self-learnt, designed, and coded an educational game using Unreal Engine and Blender
Utilized Steam's multiplayer API to make a peer-to-peer network architecture for the game.
